title: Swarna Mandala Kammalu: Diamond & Gemstone Stud Earrings
materials: Emeralds (Pachalu). Features a lustrous Hyderabadi polish for a rich
features: Intricately designed circular studs reminiscent of traditional mandala art. The open filigree design allows light to beautifully reflect off the diamonds. A central ruby is surrounded by emeralds, creating a vibrant focal point. The diamonds are set in a pave style, maximizing their brilliance. The back features a sturdy screw-back closure for secure wear.
colors: and sparkling White (Diamonds). A classic South Indian color palette symbolizing prosperity and good fortune.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. These earrings would also be stunning for a cocktail party or elegant evening event. Can be worn to auspicious occasions like poojas
description: These earrings are a true work of art, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship and the finest quality gemstones. The mandala design is both beautiful and symbolic, representing harmony and balance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a luxurious shine that will last for generations. A perfect blend of tradition and modern elegance, these earrings are sure to become a treasured heirloom.
